name: .MEP File Extension
summary: Learn about .MEP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open MEP files with Movavi Video Editor (version 10 and earlier) and Movavi Video Suite (version 14 and earlier). Later versions of these applications do not support the MEP format. To open an MEP file with either Video Editor or Video Suite, select File â†’ Open Project....
